headline: Charged: Tesla EU sales reportedly plunge in April
summary: Institutional investors and professional traders rely on The Fly to keep up-to-the-second on breaking news in the electric vehicle and clean energy space, as well as which stocks in these sectors that the best analysts on Wall Street are saying to buy and sell. From the hotly-debated high-flier Tesla (TSLA), Wall Street’s newest darling Rivian (RIVN), traditional-stalwarts turned EV-upstarts GM (GM) and Ford (F) to the numerous SPAC-deal makers that have come public in this red-hot space, The Fl

headline: Energy Transition Update - Solargik Unveils AI Platform Revolutionizing Solar Energy Management
summary: Solargik has introduced SOMA Pro, an advanced AI-driven platform for solar energy management at Intersolar 2025. This next-generation system integrates monitoring, diagnostics, and control into a single platform, enhancing operational efficiency and energy yield for photovoltaic installations. By utilizing proprietary algorithms, SOMA Pro aims to optimize solar tracker configurations and recover up to 6% of lost energy. The platform’s real-time operational intelligence allows operators to...

headline: Geopolitical Tension Casts Commercial Shadow on First Solar Stock (FSLR)
summary: The renewable energy sector is far from an easy place to get an investment right, but probably even more so these days amid geopolitical tensions, ongoing trade disruption, and a divisive debate on the future of the global energy market. First Solar Inc. (FSLR) has been one of the latest victims of such uncertainty, with the share price down an alarming 60% from a 2023 peak. While I’m generally bullish on the company’s outlook due to domestic manufacturing capabilities and government incentives
